Song.Title: Baby, Donâ€™t Cry
Song.Lyrics:
EXO - Baby Don't Cry Romanization

[Baekhyun] deoneun mangseolijima jebal nae simjangeul geodueoga
geurae nalkarounsurok joha dalbitjochado nuneul gameunbam

[Kyungsoo] na anin dareunnamja yeottdamyeon huigeuk ane hangujeolieottdeoramyeon
neoui geusaramgwa bakkun sangcheo modu taewobeoryeo

[Baekhyun & Kyungsoo] baby dont cry tonight eodumi geodjigo namyeon
baby dont cry tonight eopseottdeon ili dwilgeoya
mulgeopumi dwineungeoseun niga aniya
kkeutnae mollaya haettdeon
so baby dont cry cry nae sarangi neol jikilteni

[Suho] ojik seororeul hyanghae ittneun unmyeongeul jugo bada
eotgarril su bakke eoptneun geu mankeum deo
saranghaesseumeul nal ara

[Kyungsoo]when you smile sunshine
[Baekhyun] o neoranteule neuchyeo ittmeun dameul chalna
[Kyungsoo] on maeume padocheo
[Suho] buseojyo naerijanha

[Baekhyun & Kyungsoo] baby dont cry tonight
pokpungi molachineun bam (Baekhyun: haneuli muneojil ddae)
baby dont cry tonight jogeumeun eoullijanha
nunmulboda chanranhi bitnaneun isungan
neoreul bonaeyahaettdeon
so baby dont cry cry
nae sarangi gieokdwilteni

[Chanyeol yeah, eodu keomkeomhan gotongeui binteulwi
ibyeone motda kkaen naega muchamhi
neomeojyeodo kkeutnajyeodo
neol wihaeseoramyeon gamdanghalteni uh
daesin nareul julge, bi rok nal moreuneun neoege
dont cry
ddeugeoun nunmulbodan
chadichan useumeul boyeojweo baby

(say no more) baby (no more) dont cry
jebal mangseolijineun mala jeonbu geopumi dwil geu chalna
(say no more) baby (no more) dont cry
nunbusin sarangeuro nameul su ittge
charari geu kaleul naege taeweojweo

[Kyungsoo.] ne nunsoke gadeukchaoreuneun dalbit ooh
[Baekhyun] sorieobsi gotongsoke heulleo neomchineun i bam

[Baekhyun & Kyungsoo] baby dont cry tonight eodumi geodjigo namyeon
(Kyungsoo: i can hold you in my arms)
baby dont cry tonight eopseottdeon ili dwilgeoya
mulgeopumi dwineungeoseun niga aniyakkeutnae mollaya haettdeon
so baby dont cry cry nae sarangi neol jikilteni

[Baekhyun] ireun haetsali noga naerinda (noga)
neoreul darmeun nunbusimi naerinda (falling down)
[Suho] gileul irheun nae nuneun
ijeyacry cry cry
